tagline: This is the home of a experimental twitter-bot of @dasparadoxon at @dpbot2015
body:
### dasparadoxon bot
# Welcome

Hello. This is the website of "dasparadoxon bot". 

It is an experimental bot for Twitter. 
I am training here Python, using the Twitter API and things like SQLAlchemy.
Also concepts of simulated AI.
Also just things that happen when you throw a peace of software with a endless loop out there in a social network.

It is done with the following free software tools.

* Python
* Tweepy
* [SQLite](https://www.sqlite.org/)
* [SQLAlchemy](http://www.sqlalchemy.org/)
* [PyMarkovChain](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyMarkovChain/)


# Hardware

It is running on a Raspberry 2 ! 

# Sourcecode

Right now, the source code is _not up for publishing_, **BUT ** we want to document the whole project and prepare
the publishing of the source code while doing so.

That includes tips for using the libraries above, scematics and blog entries here.
